name: Cooking With Cain 2.5
description:
Cooking with Cain 2.5 is here! Many improvements have been made to the last release of the game.  We spent the last 10 weeks polishing, redesigning, and fixing Cooking with Cain 2. 

For those that don't know Cooking with Cain, it is a game where you can roam in 3 different levels to find loot, defeat enemies, and explore Hell. You must stop the evil Bruffel Sprouts from taking over the Underworld.

Cain must defeat food demons, by combining his twisted ingredients to form attacks. Additionally, through gathering more gold, he can upgrade the quality of his ingredients, or choose to buy some new ones from the shop.

Features:

  • A top-down Overworld where enemies can be encountered and fought in turn-based combat.
  • Many ingredients to choose from and cater to different battles.
  • A shop system wherein players can purchase upgrades for their stats and ingredients as well as new ingredients and potions.
  • 3 Levels to explore and conquer.
  • A Hubworld to hang your chef's hat when you need that rest.
  • Many enemies to defeat.
